languages.text: {n}Качнувшись в сторону, вы видите, как дуло стаб-револьвера Немезита плюется огнем. Вы осознаете, что промаха не будет, и в последний миг атакуете сами.{/n}
{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Качнувшись в сторону, вы видите, как дуло стаб-револьвера Немезита плюется огнем. Вы осознаете, что промаха не будет, и в последний миг атакуете сами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver spit out fire and realise he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final movement is to pull the trigger of your own gun.{/n}

{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final movement is to pull your own trigger too.{/n}

{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final movement is to pull your own trigger too.{/n}
{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}
{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}
{n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weichst zur Seite, siehst, wie die Mündung von Nemesits Stummelrevolver aufblitzt, und erkennst, dass er dich nicht verfehlen wird. Dir bleibt in diesem letzten Moment keine andere Wahl, als selbst anzugreifen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weichst zur Seite, siehst, wie die Mündung von Nemesits Stummelrevolver aufblitzt, und erkennst, dass er dich nicht verfehlen wird. Dir bleibt in diesem letzten Moment keine andere Wahl, als selbst anzugreifen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te inclinas a un lado, ves que el cañón del revólver compacto de Nemesitio estalla y comprendes que no va a fallar. Lo único que puedes hacer en este último movimiento es atacar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te inclinas a un lado, ves que el cañón del revólver compacto de Nemesitio estalla y comprendes que no va a fallar. Lo único que puedes hacer en este último movimiento es atacar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}横に揺れると、ネメサイトのリボルバーの銃口が火を噴くのが見えた。その弾はきっと外れない。この最後の時で自分にできることは、攻撃する事のみ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}横に揺れると、ネメサイトのリボルバーの銃口が火を噴くのが見えた。その弾はきっと外れない。この最後の時で自分にできることは、攻撃する事のみ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你闪到一旁，看到涅墨斯特手中的短筒左轮手枪喷出了火焰。你意识到，他这一枪是不会打偏的。在所剩无几的时间里，你唯一能做的事情就是发起进攻。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你闪到一旁，看到涅墨斯特手中的短筒左轮手枪喷出了火焰。你意识到，他这一枪是不会打偏的。在所剩无几的时间里，你唯一能做的事情就是发起进攻。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le côté au moment où la bouche du revolver de Némésite s'enflamme, et vous réalisez que son tir ne manquera pas sa cible. Il ne vous reste plus, dans ce dernier instant, qu'à passer à l'attaque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le côté au moment où la bouche du revolver de Némésite s'enflamme, et vous réalisez que son tir ne manquera pas sa cible. Il ne vous reste plus, dans ce dernier instant, qu'à passer à l'attaque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yana eğilmenle Nemezit'in bodur altıpatlarının ağzının alev püskürttüğünü görüyorsun ve ıskalamayacağını fark ediyorsun. Son nefesinde yapabileceğin tek şey saldırmak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway to the side, see the muzzle of Nemesite's stub revolver erupt with fire, and realise that he will not miss. All that remains for you in this final moment is to attack.{/n}
